Class Reply

  • java.lang.Object
    • Message
      • Reply

  • public class Reply
extends Message
    A class that extends Message, representing a Reply to an already existing Message
    Author:
    Chris Schmidt

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class Message

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reply

        public Reply(java.lang.String creator,
             java.lang.String text,
             Message replyTo)
        Creates a Reply with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        creator - The user creating this message
        text - The text content of the message
        replyTo - The message object that this reply is replying to

    • Method Detail

      • relevantTo

        public boolean relevantTo(java.lang.String user)
        Check if this message is relevant to the user specified in the parameter. It is relevant if the user created the message or their name is in the text surrounded by @'s Replies are also relevant to a user if the message being replied to was created by the parameter user
        Overrides:
        relevantTo in class Message
        Parameters:
        user - The user for whom we are checking
        Returns:
        true if the message is relevant to the user

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String summary of the message. The id is surrounded by \0 characters to allow it to be easily parsed from this string also includes the shortString from the message being replied to
        Overrides:
        toString in class Message
        Returns:
        the message as a String
